DOC.criteria: Healthy child know hypersensitivity vaccine component significant acute chronic infection require systemic antibiotic treatment antiviral therapy within past 14 day ascertain suspected disease cause N. meningitidis household contact intimate exposure individual positive culture N. meningitidis serogroup C within previous 60 day
